p: The identification of the chemical constituents of the PaEO performed by GC-MS as well as the percentages, retention time and Kovats Index; are presented in Table 3. The chromatographic data allowed the identification of 19 components, corresponding to 99.99% of the total oil composition. The main constituents were carvacrol [33.5%], p-cymene [28.20%], γ-terpinene [14.77%], E-caryophyllene [4.63%], acid phthalic [4.32%], γ-bergamotene [3.16%], α-terpinene [2.52%], and β-myrcene [2.03%].
